paragraphs.name: edae
paragraphs.text: Hello Jakob, good wrap up of using the support library preferences. There's one correction about the very last part, though. The reason why you had to add those styles is because you passed "0" as the defStyle in your second constructor of TimePreference. You should pass instead R.attr.dialogPreferenceStyle. That will ensure that the DialogPreference…
